Not reproducible the second time I tried these steps.

Hm - I am able to produce some errors using the following recipe.

1. start fresh workspace
2. In the welcome screen, choose Examples->Java Editor
(2.a) download the examples, say yes to reset your perspective)
3. Observe: at the right border, the welcome view is open offering me several
choices
4. (not needed, I believe) run the java editor example by clicking the hyperlink
in the welcome view
5. delete the example project
6. new feature project using the wizard, accept all the defaults
7. do not switch to the PDE perspective (probably does not matter)
8. browse through the multi-page editor of the feature.xml
9. Delete the project from the package explorer, also deleting underlying resources

I did reproduce the NPE and also this Invalid Thread Access, which make me think
it may be a threading issue:

org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Invalid thread access
